sentences: Education, training and public awareness was considered on Monday, 31 May.
Chair Chow noted that only three submissions had been received from Parties on possible means of promoting the implementation of FCCC Article 6 (Education, training and public awareness).
The Secretariat was unable to formulate proposals on ways to integrate this issue into SBSTAs work programme.
He proposed setting a new date for submissions.
The EU suggested further pursuing education, training and public awareness in the work on good practices in policies and measures.
He called on the Secretariat to advise on the likely costs of undertaking further work on these issues.
The REPUBLIC OF KOREA noted the need for a technical guide to support developing countries and welcomed the private sector participation in promoting awareness activities.
Parties were invited to submit further proposals to the Secretariat by 15 October 1999 to serve as a basis for more substantive discussions at SBSTA-12.
enb_long_title: Tenth Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI)
